long_description: An advanced binding for skiers weighing 110 - 275 lbs., the Salomon STH 2 WTR 13 downhill ski bindings feature a lower toepiece and wide width to enhance performance on fat skis. Low, 18mm stand height in toepiece and wide metal baseplate transmit power precisely to wide skis. Elastomer layer in bindings smoothes out the ride on firm snow. Long, automatically adjusting toe wings increase contact zone with boots for precise boot hold and enhanced energy transmission to edges. Heelpiece from Salomon's Guardian series lets you easily feel when you're locked into the binding. Stomp Pedal antifriction device uses fewer moving parts than standard designs, increasing durability and maintaining reliable release. Choose from 90, 100 and 115mm brake widths; 4 - 13 DIN range provides performance for advanced skiers. The Salomon STH 2 WTR 13 downhill ski bindings are compatable with all standared alpine/downhill boots and the Salomon WTR boot soles, not included.
